IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PRODUCE A CHALLENGING AND DIVERSE REPERTOIRE OF THEATRICAL WORK FOR THE MEMPHIS COMMUNITY, TO PROVIDE A NURTURING ARTISTIC HOME WHERE ARTISTS CAN PRACTICE THEIR CRAFT, SHARE THEIR TALENT, AND TO MAKE ALL PRODUCTIONS AVAILABLE THROUGH ACCESS, OUTREACH, AND EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PRODUCE A CHALLENGING AND DIVERSE REPERTOIRE OF THEATRICAL WORK FOR THE MEMPHIS COMMUNITY, TO PROVIDE A NURTURING ARTISTIC HOME WHERE ARTISTS CAN PRACTICE THEIR CRAFT, SHARE THEIR TALENT, AND TO MAKE ALL PRODUCTIONS AVAILABLE THROUGH ACCESS, OUTREACH, AND EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES.
IRS990.Desc: THEATRICAL PERFORMANCES: CIRCUIT PLAYHOUSE, INC'S PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO PROVIDE PERMANENT PROFESSIONAL THEATRE FOR THE ENRICHMENT OF THE MEMPHIS COMMUNITY. CIRCUIT UNDERTAKES 14 PRODUCTIONS EACH SEASON. THROUGH OUR OUTREACH PROGRAMS, WE STRIVE TO MAKE EACH PRODUCTION AVAILABLE TO ALL WHO WISH TO ATTEND, REGARDLESS OF THEIR FINANCIAL MEANS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: UNIFIED PROFESSIONAL THEATRE AUDITIONS ("UPTA") : THESE COMBINED AUDITIONS, HELD ANNUALLY IN FEBRUARY, PROVIDE ACTORS AND PRODUCTION PERSONNEL THE OPPORTUNITY TO BE SEEN BY REPRESENTATIVES OF QUALITY PROFESSIONAL THEATRE COMPANIES FROM ACROSS THE COUNTRY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THEATRE FOR YOUTH: THE SUMMER YOUTH CONSERVATORY OFFERS INSTRUCTION FOR ANY STUDENT INTERESTED IN THEATRE, THROUGH CLASSES TAUGHT BY PROFESSIONAL ARTISTS. THE THEATRE SCHOOL PROVIDES CLASSES IN PERFORMANCE FOR CHILDREN AS WELL AS ADULTS, WHICH GIVES STUDENTS THE OPPORTUNITY TO EXPAND THEIR PERFORMANCE SKILLS IN ACTING, MUSIC, AND DANCE. Q&A, QUEER YOUTH THEATRE, PROVIDES YOUTH AGES 14-21 A THEATRICAL OUTLET TO CREATE AWARENESS WITHIN MEMPHIS FOR THE LGBTQIA AND STRAIGHT ALLIED YOUTH.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN ACCORDANCE WITH GAAP, IF APPLICABLE, THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES INTEREST EXPENSE AND PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS IN OPERATING EXPENSE. NO AMOUNTS HAVE BEEN RECOGNIZED IN EXPENSES FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023. INFORMATIONAL TAX RETURNS FOR 2019 AND SUBSEQUENT YEARS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS IS FOR THE BOARD TO REVIEW THE FORM 990 AND FORM 990-T PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST LETTERS ARE SENT ANNUALLY TO THE BOARD MEMBERS WHO ARE ASKED TO ACKNOWLEDGE ANY CONFLICTS AT THAT TIME.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR.
